name: Doom Stick
details:
Gated fuzzDoes it Fuzz?  Yeah.  It Fuzzes.
But does it DOOM!?  Oh yeah.  It DOOMS.
One knob to keep it simple.
Hit it and get heavy.
PLEASE NOTE:  THIS PEDAL HAS A VERY HEAVY AND AGGRESSIVE FIXED NOISE-GATE BUILT INTO THE CIRCUIT
https://www.mrblackpedals.com/products/doomstick-fuzz
